## nameMock() function

Helper function that will name this mock if it isn't already named.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nameMock: <M extends AnyMockDescriptor>(mock: M, context: MatchContext) => M
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

mock


</td><td>

M


</td><td>

a Mock Descriptor object


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

context


</td><td>

[MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md)


</td><td>

the [MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md) for this run


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

M

a mock descriptor object where the request and response are guaranteed to be named.

## Remarks

You probably don't need to use this function, it is used by ContractCase internals. TODO: it could be moved to the core.
